channel.title: Star Fox on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Star Fox on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Super FX Turbo Mode
item.description: Iâ€™m going to come right out and say it: I want a Super NES Classic. I wanted an NES Classic, but that sold out too quickly and the variations on the market cost way too much money, so I have my finger on the trigger for potential pre-orders of the new device, expected to hit this week. I, like most of my other fellow retro geeks, can at least embrace the fact that we still have as much of a shot at getting these mini-consoles right now as we did Pearl Jam tickets circa 1994.
